settings.importDesc: Upload an .enex file to import your notes.
settings.importDescOneNote: Export your OneNote pages as .mht (File > Export > Single File Web Page), then upload here. Also supports .html and .zip files.
settings.techStack: Built with React, Vite, TailwindCSS and Fastify.
settings.notificationSoundDescription: Play a sound when new notifications arrive
settings.emailNotificationsDescription: Receive email notifications when you are offline (does not affect verification and invitation emails)

notebooks.noNotebooks: No notebooks found. Create one to get started.
notebooks.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this notebook? All notes inside will be moved to Trash.

notebooks.renameDescription: Enter the new name for the notebook.

tags.noNotes: No notes associated with this tag.

trash.deleteForeverConfirm: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
trash.noteInTrash: This note is in the trash
trash.selectNote: Select a note to view options
trash.emptyDescription: Notes you delete are moved here.
trash.emptyConfirm: Are you sure you want to empty the trash? This action cannot be undone.
trash.deleteConfirm: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.

tasks.noTasks: No reminders found. Add a reminder to a note or set a due date on a Kanban card.

taskLists.title: Task Lists
taskLists.deleteListConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this list? This action cannot be undone.
taskLists.noListsDescription: Create your first list to get started
taskLists.onlyCheckerCanUncheck: Only the person who checked this item can uncheck it
taskLists.convertToKanbanConfirm: Convert this task list into a Kanban board? Checked items will go to "Done" and unchecked to "To Do".
taskLists.convertedToKanban: Task list converted to Kanban board
taskLists.keepOrRemoveMessage: The task list has been converted to a Kanban board. Would you like to keep or remove the original task list?

auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.hasAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.name: Name
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.checkEmailDescription: If an account exists for that email, we've sent password reset instructions.
auth.resetLinkSent: Reset link sent to your email
auth.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.userExists: User already exists with this email
errors.unverified: Account not verified. Please check your email.

auth.checkEmailVerify: Please check your email to verify your account. The link expires in 24 hours.
auth.verificationSuccessBody: Your account has been successfully verified. You can now log in.
auth.invalidLink: The link is invalid or has expired.
auth.requestInviteSub: Join Notiq to organize your life.
auth.requestReceivedDesc: We have received your request. Using the email provided, we will notify you once your invitation is approved.
auth.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please try again later.

vault.title: Secure Vault
vault.setupDescription: Create a PIN to protect your most private notes. This PIN will be required to access the Vault.
vault.pinTooShort: PIN must be at least 4 characters
vault.lockedDescription: Enter your PIN to access your secure notes.
vault.empty: Your vault is empty. Create a secure note to get started.
vault.decryptError: Error decrypting note. PIN might be incorrect.
vault.warningDescription: Your vault PIN cannot be recovered if forgotten. If you lose your PIN, you will permanently lose access to all notes stored in the vault. There is no recovery option available.
vault.warningConfirm: I understand that the PIN is not recoverable
vault.resetVaultDescription: Since the PIN cannot be recovered, the only option is to completely reset your vault. This will permanently delete ALL notes stored in the vault.
vault.resetVaultWarning: This action is irreversible. All your secure notes will be permanently lost.
vault.resetVaultSuccess: Vault has been reset. You can now set up a new PIN.
vault.deletePermanentlyConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

credential.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?
credential.deleteConfirmPermanent: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this credential? This action cannot be undone.

sharing.noSharedKanbanBoards: No kanban boards shared with you yet

entries.editorStatusBar: Live editor status bar (characters, lines, cursor position)
entries.notebookPickerNewNote: Notebook picker when creating a new note from home
entries.vaultPermanentDelete: Vault items are now permanently deleted (no longer stuck in limbo)
entries.attachmentRaceCondition: Fixed image reappearing after deleting attachment
entries.lineHeightRefinement: Refined default line height for better readability
entries.taskLists: Task Lists — Create and manage task lists with checkable items, priorities, and due dates
entries.taskListSharing: Task List Sharing — Share task lists with collaborators via email or groups
entries.taskListNotifications: Task List Notifications — Get notified when collaborators add, check, or remove items
entries.taskListDragDrop: Drag & Drop Reordering — Reorder task items by dragging them into position
entries.remindersRename: Reminders section — Activities renamed to Reminders for clarity
entries.kanbanBoards: Kanban Boards — Visual project management with columns, cards, and drag & drop
entries.kanbanCoverImages: Board Cover Images — Customize boards with cover images
entries.kanbanPresence: Board Presence — See who is viewing a board in real time
entries.kanbanChat: Board Chat — Real-time messaging with board collaborators
entries.kanbanSharing: Board Sharing — Share kanban boards with collaborators and accept invitations
entries.notificationLinks: Clickable Notifications — Notifications now link directly to the relevant item
entries.chatTieredNotifications: Smart Chat Notifications — Sound, badge, in-app, or email depending on your activity
entries.onenoteImport: OneNote Import — Import notes from OneNote via .mht, .html, or .zip files
entries.kanbanFilters: Kanban Filters — Search, filter by assignee, due date, linked notes, and comments
entries.ganttExport: Gantt XLSX Export — Professional 3-sheet Excel report with Gantt chart, overview, and all cards
entries.kanbanReminders: Kanban Reminders — Set reminders on Kanban cards with due dates, shown in Reminders page
entries.kanbanHooksFix: Fixed Kanban board crash when navigating between pages
entries.kanbanLocaleFix: Fixed due date display language on Kanban cards
entries.boardNoteLink: Board Note Linking — Link a note to an entire Kanban board with automatic sharing
entries.boardAvatar: Board Avatar — Add a small avatar image to Kanban boards, shown everywhere
entries.groupSharingMembers: Group Sharing for Members — All group members can now use the group to share items
entries.autoNavigateKanban: Auto-navigate to Kanban board after converting a note
entries.autoNavigateTasks: Auto-navigate to Tasks page after converting a note to task list
entries.taskListKeepOrRemove: Keep or Remove dialog when converting a task list to Kanban board
entries.notificationSmartLinks: Notification smart links — Click to navigate to Shared With Me with tab and item highlight
entries.conversionNavigation: Fixed navigation after converting notes/task lists to Kanban boards or task lists
entries.notebookSelectorDisabled: Fixed notebook selector appearing disabled in note editor
entries.taskListDeleteError: Fixed error when deleting a task list
entries.kanbanReminderAutoComplete: Kanban reminders auto-complete when card is moved to the last column
entries.taskReminderAutoComplete: Completed task items no longer appear as active reminders
entries.sharingEmailFix: Fixed email invitation acceptance — invitations now link directly to the Sharing Center
entries.sentInvitationsPanel: Sent Invitations Panel — View, resend, or cancel all sharing invitations you've sent
entries.smartMerge: Smart Merge — Duplicate detection when adding items to existing Kanban boards or task lists
entries.kanbanColumnDnD: Kanban Column Reordering — Drag & drop columns to rearrange your board layout
entries.taskListToKanbanModal: Task List to Kanban — Choose an existing board or create new, with automatic task placement
entries.notebookRenameSidebar: Notebook Rename — Double-click (desktop) or long-press (mobile) to rename notebooks in the sidebar
entries.collapsibleNoteList: Collapsible Note List — Collapse the notes/vault list panel for a wider editor view
entries.notebookMoveFix: Fixed notebook picker in editor — selecting a notebook now moves the note immediately
entries.removedHomeItem: Streamlined navigation — Removed redundant Home menu item
entries.sharingIndicators: Sharing Indicators — Green badge with user count on all shared items (notes, task lists, kanban boards, notebooks)
entries.sharedUsersModal: Shared Users Modal — Click any sharing badge to see a read-only list of shared users with avatars and permissions
entries.groupMemberVisibility: Group Member Visibility — View member lists of groups you belong to (expandable, read-only)
entries.sidebarStyleAlignment: Sidebar Style Alignment — Consistent icons, colors, hover effects and overlay buttons across all sidebar items
entries.sidebarCollapse: Collapsible Sidebar — Desktop sidebar collapses to a slim icon rail for maximum workspace (Ctrl+B)
entries.collapseAll: Collapse All — One-click button to collapse both sidebar and note list simultaneously
entries.responsiveToolbar: Responsive Editor Toolbar — Toolbar adapts to screen width with overflow menu on smaller screens
entries.editorOverflowFix: Fixed editor overflow — Long unwrapped text no longer hides header buttons or toolbar
entries.lineHeightValidation: Fixed line-height validation to prevent text overlap on auto-wrapped lines
entries.mobileCloseButton: Improved mobile sidebar close button — Integrated into user profile area
entries.settingsImportAlignment: Settings import section now shows both Evernote and OneNote import options
entries.kanbanPriority: Card Priority — Set priority levels (Standby, Low, Medium, High, Critical) on Kanban cards with color-coded flags
entries.kanbanCommentNotifications: Comment Notifications — Get notified when comments are added or deleted on Kanban cards
entries.kanbanMoveNotifications: Card Move Notifications — Get notified when cards are moved between columns
entries.emailNotificationPreference: Email Notification Preference — Toggle email notifications on/off in Settings
entries.italianTimeAgoFix: Fixed Italian timestamps showing future tense instead of past tense
entries.kanbanCommentCountFix: Fixed comment count not showing on Kanban cards
entries.kanbanOfflineSync: Kanban Offline Sync — Boards, columns, and cards now work offline via IndexedDB
entries.kanbanGroupSharing: Kanban Group Sharing — Share boards with entire groups, not just individual emails
entries.backendTypeSafety: Backend Type Safety — Eliminated ~124 unsafe types across production code
entries.vaultPBKDF2: Vault Security Upgrade — Encryption now uses PBKDF2 key derivation (100k iterations) for stronger protection
entries.perRouteRateLimiting: Per-Route Rate Limiting — Targeted rate limits on sensitive endpoints (auth, password reset)
entries.frontendLintCleanup: Code Quality — Fixed 130 lint errors across the frontend codebase
entries.backendUnitTests: Backend Testing — 70 new unit tests covering auth, notes, sharing, task lists, and notifications
entries.kanbanColumnI18n: Kanban Column Localization — Default column names now display in your language
entries.avatarPropagation: Avatar Fix — User avatars now display correctly in all sharing modals
entries.dbIndexes: Database Performance — Added indexes for faster group, kanban chat, and audit queries
entries.initialRelease: Initial release with full feature set

ai.title: AI Configuration
ai.enabledDesc: Enable the AI assistant for all users. Requires a valid API key.

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.emptyState: Ask a question or use a quick action to get started.
ai.tagsPrompt: Suggest relevant tags for this note.
ai.encryptedNotSupported: AI is not available for encrypted notes.
